name: RBI - Asset Classification and Provisioning
description: Classification of assets as standard, sub-standard, doubtful or loss assets
requirements: Disclosure of NPA levels, provisioning coverage ratio, movement in NPAs

name: RBI - Capital Adequacy Ratio
description: Banks must maintain minimum capital adequacy ratio as per Basel III norms
requirements: Disclosure of CRAR, Tier I and Tier II capital, risk-weighted assets

name: RBI - Liquidity Coverage Ratio
description: Banks must maintain adequate liquidity to meet short-term obligations
requirements: Disclosure of LCR, high quality liquid assets, net cash outflows

name: RBI - Large Exposures Framework
description: Limits on bank's exposure to single and group borrowers
requirements: Disclosure of large exposures, concentration risk, exposure limits
